org.grouplens.lenskit.eval

Interface EvalTask<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Future<T>, ListenableFuture<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTask, CrossfoldTask, DumpGraphTask, GroovyActionTask, PackTask, SubsampleTask, TrainModelTask, TrainTestEvalTask

    public interface EvalTask<T>
extends ListenableFuture<T>
    An evaluation task.
    Since:
    1.3

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute()
      throws TaskExecutionException
        Execute the task. After executing, task (as a future) should be done.
        Throws:
        TaskExecutionException - If there is an error executing the task.
